trends: There have been 66 other sightings in Jacksonville
There were no other sightings in Jacksonville on or around October 24th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI shot some video footage of A US NAVY F18F Super Hornet and 2010 Navy Jacksonville Air show ,After reviewing my footage i came across 15 seconds of video with and object that approaches the aircraft and the exits quite quickly, No other aircraft was permitted in the area at the time of the f18 demo I noticed a distinct triangle shape of the object ,The object in the video appeared to move Abruptly as the aircraft entered in the frame. The object moved from the north to south then shot up as the aircraft approached it's direction.
Summary: air show video footage captured an object during an F18 demo
